content: in this legal case the court in savona has made a final decision one party referred to as cc has been ordered to pay the legal costs in favor of the other party referred to as gc the court has also determined the total value of the estate involved in the case which includes properties and cash in a bank account this estate will be divided equally between gc and another party referred to as ed the court has dissolved a community inheritance and assigned specific assets to each party the heirs of ed have been authorized to withdraw the remaining balance from a bank account with the balance being given to gc the court has settled the costs of the proceedings and determined that the expenses for expert assessments will be shared equally between gc and ed the courts decision was made on june 10 2020 and filed electronically on november 6 2020
